name: smithery-runner
description: Install and run containerized MCP servers in virtualised sandboxes

scripts.package:win: rimraf dist && mkdirp dist && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync(process.execPath, 'dist/smithery-win.exe')" && npx postject dist/smithery-win.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
scripts.package:linux: mkdir -p dist && cp $(command -v node) dist/smithery-linux && npx postject dist/smithery-linux NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 && chmod +x dist/smithery-linux
scripts.package:mac: mkdir -p dist && cp $(command -v node) dist/smithery-macos && codesign --remove-signature dist/smithery-macos && npx postject dist/smithery-macos NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 --macho-segment-name NODE_SEA && chmod +x dist/smithery-macos && codesign --sign - dist/smithery-macos
scripts.package: npm run package:clean && npm run package:config && npm run package:blob && tsx scripts/package-platform.ts
